name: GLB
description: GLB (Global Liquidity Bank) is the worldâ€™s first RWA (Real World Asset) digital asset trading platform created by the Merlion Blockchain Foundation in Singapore. It focuses on the digitization of real-world assets such as equity, bonds, precious metals, commodities, energy, and artworks, enabling the trading and management of these assets through blockchain technology. GLB aims to provide global users with a new way of asset trading and management through innovative technology and business models.
